channel.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
channel.description:
[size=50pt]HELP ME![/size]
i need help with this uTorrent? i've been trying to help my friend get his server online... and port forwarding doesnt work... (router is ffed up? [VERIZON ROUTER]) and so we turned to a uTorrent... and we cant figure out how to use it? anyone help ?
HELP ME I DONT KNOW HOW TO USE A uTORRENT!

item.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

sigh i CANT port forward… so… that COULD be useles… if i cant port forward… do i need a uTorrent?

Read full topic

item.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Utorrent doesn’t work for some ppl. I know how to portforward an Verizon router, i did it alot of times over teamviewer. (I have D-Link not Verizon)

Read full topic

item.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

When you open utorrent the first time you might want to change your port to a random port 55555 then apply and close, then re-open and change to 43594 .

Just a suggestion

Read full topic

item.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
item.dc:creator: @benscape benscape
item.description:
@benscape wrote:

[quote=“koopa king, post:2, topic:282558”]Open->Options->Preferences->Port = 43594->OK

After that just close it and people can connect to your server.[/quote]
You also might want to add that he still needs to use No-ip for his server.

Read full topic

item.title: %%%HELP WITH uTORRENT!%%%
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Open->Options->Preferences->Port = 43594->OK

After that just close it and people can connect to your server.

Read full topic
